message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I can go. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? This product truly delivers exceptional value.
I appreciate your understanding, but I still need to be mindful of my budget. How about we meet at $14,000?
